game.name: It Consumes
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: It Consumes is a roguelite arena-FPS in the dark. Use strange objects to reveal your surroundings and kill demons hiding in the shadows. Upgrade your abilities, unlock new weapons, and conquer what lurks in the darkness.
game.shortDescriptionEn: It Consumes is a roguelite arena-FPS in the dark. Use strange objects to reveal your surroundings and kill demons hiding in the shadows. Upgrade your abilities, unlock new weapons, and conquer what lurks in the darkness.
